SEARCH
程序包 com.hsmkmathlib.matrix

类 MatrixUtils

java.lang.Object
com.hsmkmathlib.matrix.MatrixUtils
public final class MatrixUtils extends Object
A utility class that provides static methods for matrix operations.

This class includes operations such as:

  • Matrix addition
  • Matrix subtraction
  • Matrix multiplication
  • Element-wise multiplication
  • Matrix transposition
  • Creating special matrices (ones, zeros)

  • 方法详细资料

    • add

      public static Matrix add(Matrix a, Matrix b)
      Adds two matrices together.
      参数:
      a - the first matrix
      b - the second matrix
      返回:
      a new matrix containing the sum of the input matrices
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either matrix is null or if the matrices have different dimensions

    • copyMatrix

      public static Matrix copyMatrix(Matrix a)
      Creates a deep copy of a matrix.
      参数:
      a - the matrix to be copied
      返回:
      a new matrix containing the same values as the input matrix
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input matrix is null

    • subtract

      public static Matrix subtract(Matrix a, Matrix b)
      Subtracts the second matrix from the first matrix.
      参数:
      a - the first matrix (minuend)
      b - the second matrix (subtrahend)
      返回:
      a new matrix containing the difference of the input matrices
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either matrix is null or if the matrices have different dimensions

    • multiply

      public static Matrix multiply(Matrix a, Matrix b)
      Multiplies two matrices together.
      参数:
      a - the first matrix
      b - the second matrix
      返回:
      a new matrix containing the product of the input matrices
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either matrix is null or if the number of columns in the first matrix does not match the number of rows in the second matrix

    • cdotMultiply

      public static Matrix cdotMultiply(Matrix a, Matrix b)
      Performs element-wise multiplication (Hadamard product) of two matrices.
      参数:
      a - the first matrix
      b - the second matrix
      返回:
      a new matrix containing the element-wise product of the input matrices
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either matrix is null or if the matrices have different dimensions

    • onesMatrix

      public static Matrix onesMatrix(int rows, int cols)
      Creates a matrix filled with ones.
      参数:
      rows - the number of rows in the matrix
      cols - the number of columns in the matrix
      返回:
      a new matrix filled with ones

    • onesMatrix

      public static Matrix onesMatrix(int rows, int cols, int scalar)
      Creates a matrix filled with a specified scalar value.
      参数:
      rows - the number of rows in the matrix
      cols - the number of columns in the matrix
      scalar - the value to fill the matrix with
      返回:
      a new matrix filled with the specified scalar value

    • zerosMatrix

      public static Matrix zerosMatrix(int rows, int cols)
      Creates a matrix filled with zeros.
      参数:
      rows - the number of rows in the matrix
      cols - the number of columns in the matrix
      返回:
      a new matrix filled with zeros

    • transpose

      public static Matrix transpose(Matrix a)
      Creates the transpose of a matrix.
      参数:
      a - the matrix to be transposed
      返回:
      a new matrix containing the transpose of the input matrix
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input matrix is null
